avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: This is your avatar. Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
avatar.footer: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.

displayName.title: Display Name
displayName.description: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.

email.title: Email
email.description: Your primary email will be used for account-related notifications.
email.footer: Emails must be verified to be able to login with them or be used as primary email.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Choose how system looks to you. Select a single theme, or sync with your system.

themeMode.title: Theme mode
themeMode.description: System will use your selected theme

userId.title: Your {siteName} ID
userId.description: This is your user ID within {siteName}.
userId.footer: Used when interacting with the API.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently remove your Personal Account and all of its contents from the platform. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.

2fa.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling two-factor authentication.

setup.qrDescription: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app or enter the setup key manually.

backup.description: Save these backup codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your device.

alerts.enabled: Two-factor authentication has been enabled. Please set it up.
alerts.setupSuccess: Two-factor authentication has been set up successfully.
alerts.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.

2fa.footer: Use an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.
